name: Attack of the Dunce
description:
You were in your home, when suddenly you noticed there was a beautiful princess trapped at the top of Dunce Castle, the home of Sir Dunce the Annoying. Beckoning you to come save her, the princess is taken away by the Dunce into his dungeon. It is up to you to save the princess and deal with the Dunce.

-20 Large levels with intriguing puzzles and difficult challenges
-4 Epic boss fights with Sir Dunce the Annoying
-Full controller support
-PC, Mac, and Linux compatibility
-Continued support and updates if problems arise
-No DLC. (Any future levels will be given to current buyers for free.)
